title: Welcome to AbiliLife!
message: Thank you for joining AbiliLife. Explore our mobility services designed for your needs.

title: Account Successfully Created
message: Your AbiliLife account has been created successfully. You can now book rides and access services.

title: Ride Booked Successfully
message: Your private ride with Ace Mobility is confirmed for tomorrow at 9:00 AM.

title: Ace Service Update
message: Your Ace Mobility ride is on its way! The driver will arrive in 10 minutes.

title: Ride Reminder
message: You have a scheduled ride to the Community Center at 2:00 PM today.

title: Mobility Service Feedback
message: Please rate your recent ride with Ace Mobility.

title: New Mobility Option Available
message: Shared van service is now available in your area for group rides.

title: Route Change Notification
message: Your usual bus route has a detour today. Check the app for details.

title: Caregiver Ride Scheduled
message: A caregiver has scheduled a ride for you at 11:00 AM tomorrow.
